lead_paragraph: With high numbers of apartment dwellers, New York, along with other cities, represents the promise and challenge of the untapped market for electric vehicles.

headline.print_headline: Finding Easier Ways to Charge Electric Cars
headline.main: Finding Easier Ways to Charge Electric Vehicles

snippet: With high numbers of apartment dwellers, New York, along with other cities, represents the promise and challenge of the untapped market for electric vehicles.
abstract: Wheels column; Hevo Power, Brooklyn-based startup founded by Jeremy McCool, is seeking to create home for electric cars in urban environments where it is difficult to get access to traditional chargers; firm's ideas include wireless chargers that look like manhole covers and trucks that charge vehicles while they are parked; untapped market could prove highly lucrative if problems are solved.
